title: Create troubleshooting guide
description:
Document common issues and solutions.

**Sections:**
- Daemon won't start (port conflicts, permissions, Node version)
- Plugin can't connect (firewall, daemon not running, wrong port)
- Tasks not syncing (WebSocket issues, file permissions)
- MCP tools not working (proxy not running, wrong project path)
- Performance issues (large activity.log, many tasks)

**Location:** docs/TROUBLESHOOTING.md
